definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-

sentences.english: These superhuman skills had at times been rewarded or punished by Chinese dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 這些超人的技能在中國的不同朝代曾被褒獎或貶抑。

sentences.english: The movie begins with Superman’s failed search for Krypton.
sentences.chinese: 電影以超人尋找氪星人失敗開場。

sentences.english: Superman has provided a chance to his girl of being a canning bride.
sentences.chinese: 超人已向他的姑娘提供了一個成爲罐頭業新娘的機會。

sentences.english: We know he can leap over tall buildings and pick up cars with bare hands.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道，超人可以跳越高樓大廈，徒手抓起汽車。

sentences.english: Precognition is a form of clairvoyance.
sentences.chinese: 預知是超人的洞察力的一種形式。

sentences.english: He thinks of becoming Action Kamen in order to attract people's attention.
sentences.chinese: 或者，可以考慮扮個動感超人引起大家注意。

sentences.english: Sexy superhero costumes are reportedly going to be big in the US this Halloween.
sentences.chinese: 有報道稱性感女超人將在美國萬聖節大受歡迎。

sentences.english: What are your thoughts of Wonder Woman as a feminist symbol?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼看把神力女超人作爲婦女的象徵？

sentences.english: The vice-president should be an accomplished but subordinate personality.
sentences.chinese: 副總統應當有超人的才華和敢爲人下的個性。

sentences.english: They don't make you superhuman. They will just bring you back to your best.
sentences.chinese: 藥物不能使你成爲超人，但可以使你回到最佳狀態。

sentences.english: Exceed person ability to wear underpants outside only?
sentences.chinese: 難道只有超人才能把褲衩穿在外邊嗎？

sentences.english: Watching BvS was like watching a world through a keyhole.
sentences.chinese: 看蝙蝠俠大戰超人就像在從一個鑰匙孔看一個世界。

sentences.english: My dream is to does a superwoman.
sentences.chinese: 我的夢想是做一個女超人。

sentences.english: But I would really appreciate it  if you flew lower, Superman.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果你能飛得低一點，那就太好了，超人。

definition: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, US comic book series, first appeared in 1984, also films, video games etc
Sherlock Holmes, 歇洛克·福爾摩斯|歇洛克·福尔摩斯[Xie1 luo4 ke4 · Fu2 er3 mo2 si1]
